translation.en: [man] It was a waking dream,
the kind that arrives in the twilight between sleep and the real world.
translation.de: im Zwielicht zwischen Schlaf und realer Welt.

translation.en: I sat straight up in bed and said out loud,
"I'm going to be President of the United States."
It does seem to be the hot job everyone aspires to nowadays.
translation.de: Auf diesen Job sind heutzutage alle scharf.

translation.en: The air of impossibility has been removed.
translation.de: Der Nimbus der Unmöglichkeit wurde ausgeräumt.

translation.en: I had that dream when I was seven years old, Dean Lawrence,
translation.de: Ich träumte mit sieben davon, Dekan Lawrence,

translation.en: and I've spent my entire life studying the lives of former presidents
translation.de: und studierte das Leben von Ex-Präsidenten,

translation.en: to identify common experiences and traits that led to their inevitable election victories.
translation.de: um gemeinsame Eigenschaften zu finden, die zum unausweichlichen Wahlsieg führten.

translation.en: Such as?
I only went back as far as Reagan.
As far as I'm concerned, he created the modern presidency, the presidency of television and celebrity.
translation.de: dem Begründer der modernen Präsidentschaft des Fernsehens und der Prominenz.

translation.en: People like to think of their presidents as characters they see on TV.
Most never actually see them in real life.
translation.de: Kaum einer sieht sie in echt.

translation.en: Reagan and Bush Sr. were both presidents of their senior classes in high school.
translation.de: Reagan und Bush Senior waren beide Schülersprecher.

translation.en: Which, I assume, you are on your way to accomplishing.
I believe I have the election well in hand, yes.
translation.de: Ich glaube, ich werde gewählt, ja.

translation.en: Interestingly, Reagan, Clinton, and Obama were all born into poverty
translation.de: Reagan, Clinton und Obama waren von Geburt arm,

translation.en: while the Bushes were both highborn.
How do you reconcile that with your master plan?
translation.de: Wie passt das in Ihren Masterplan?

translation.en: Well, I have the good fortune of being born both rich and poor.
translation.de: Ich habe das Glück, von Geburt reich und arm zu sein.

translation.en: Your family has generational wealth.
Yes, true, but I’m also the only son of a cocktail waitress
translation.de: Aber ich bin auch der einzige Sohn einer Kellnerin

translation.en: from the Landing Strip Gentlemen's Club in Laconia, New Hampshire.
translation.de: im Herren-Stripclub in Laconia, New Hampshire.

translation.en: -You’re adopted. -Yes.
Why Harvard, Payton?
Harvard's produced more presidents than any other school. Seven.
translation.de: Harvard stellte die meisten Präsidenten. Sieben.

translation.en: Hmm. Well, I appreciate that.
You’re clearly a very well-prepared young man. Polished.
translation.de: Sie sind ein sehr gut vorbereiteter junger Mann. Gewandt.

translation.en: Thank you, Dean Lawrence. But I’m not here to see the polish.
You're concerned about my GPA? -Because I've-- -I don’t care about your grades.
translation.de: -Meine Noten beunruhigen Sie. Ich... -Ihre Noten sind mir egal.

translation.en: I want to know you.
The real you.
Have you ever been compelled to go meet your birth mother?
translation.de: Wollten Sie je Ihre leibliche Mutter treffen?

translation.en: No.
My real mother has always been my greatest champion and closest confidant.
translation.de: Meine echte Mutter ist meine Förderin und engste Vertraute.

translation.en: When was the last time you cried?
I cried at the end of It’s a Wonderful Life last Christmas.
translation.de: Weihnachten bei Ist das Leben nicht schön?

translation.en: Everyone cries at the end of that movie.
I know.
Did you cry because you were moved
or because you felt like you were supposed to?
Does it matter?
You were great.
I’ve noticed... every time we have sex,
no matter what I do, you seem to really enjoy it.
translation.de: dass dir alles gefällt, was ich mache.

translation.en: I don’t know, I feel like, maybe, sometimes, you’re faking it.
translation.de: Manchmal denke ich, du täuschst es vor.

translation.en: I am.
I don’t like you pretending. I mean,
translation.de: Das will ich nicht. Ich meine...

translation.en: aren’t we supposed to be generating intimacy?
Sure, but we're also giving you the self-confidence you need to become the man I know you can be.
translation.de: Ja, und wir geben dir Selbstvertrauen, um der Mann zu werden, der in dir steckt.

translation.en: I know you watch porn.
Your brain is wired to enjoy sex that's presentational.
translation.de: Dir gefällt Sex, der etwas hermacht.

translation.en: -Okay, but I don’t want presentational. -[giggles]
translation.de: Ok, aber ich will nichts hermachen.

translation.en: I want authentic.
I will do better at appearing more authentic from now on.
translation.de: Dann bemühe ich mich, authentischer zu wirken.

translation.en: I don’t want you to appear authentic, I want you to be authentic.
translation.de: Du sollst nicht authentisch wirken, sondern es sein.

translation.en: I don’t understand. What’s the difference?
I promise to be more real from now on.
translation.de: Ich verspreche, ab jetzt echter zu sein.

translation.en: -Where you going? -I have a surf lesson.
We’re going back to Hawaii this Christmas
and I refuse to let my dad call me Barney and vanquish me to the ankle busters.
translation.de: soll Dad mich nicht auf den Mini-Wellen übertrumpfen.

translation.en: Let there be one place he doesn’t find me a complete disappointment.
translation.de: Einmal will ich keine Enttäuschung für ihn sein.

translation.en: Hey, he thinks you're great.
He thinks I’m pretty. And he likes pretty things.
translation.de: Er findet mich hübsch. Und er mag hübsche Dinge.

translation.en: [man] River!
-River! -[River] I'm in here.
You traitor. You backstabbing son of a bitch.
You know how important this is to me. How dare you run against me?
translation.de: Es ist mir so wichtig! Du kandidierst gegen mich?

translation.en: -Oh, I know. Listen, calm down-- -No. You calm down. I have the floor now.
translation.de: -Ja. Hör zu. Beruhige dich... -Nein. Beruhige du dich. Ich rede jetzt.

translation.en: Since when have you wanted to be the president? This wasn’t even your idea, was it?
translation.de: Seit wann willst du Sprecher werden? Nicht deine Idee, oder?

translation.en: No, it was Astrid's idea.
She said I had to do it if I had a shot of getting into Stanford and...
translation.de: Sie sagte, es sei nötig, um Chancen auf Stanford zu haben...

translation.en: I had to do something to get my parents off my back.
Screw you. Do you not understand you're gonna beat me? Okay? You're better looking than me.
translation.de: Leck mich. Du besiegst mich. Du siehst besser aus als ich.

translation.en: You're more popular, co-captain of the lacrosse team, so--
You're blowing this thing way out of proportion.
The moment you win, I'll tell everyone that we had sex and you're living a lie.
translation.de: Nach deinem Sieg sage ich, wir hatten Sex, und du lebst eine Lüge.

translation.en: So, there's that.
-Payton. -I'm warning you,
do not screw with my dream. All right? I'm on a singular path. Okay?
translation.de: Mach mir meinen Traum nicht kaputt. Ich bin auf einem geraden Weg. Ok?

translation.en: You're not gonna get in the way, or I swear to God, I will make you pay.
translation.de: Steh mir nicht im Weg, sonst wirst du es bereuen. Ok?

translation.en: Okay? So don't mess with me, River.
translation.de: Leg dich nicht mit mir an!

translation.en: Are we clear?
I've never seen you like this.
I don't recognize this person.
Well, I don't care, okay? I'm not a box, right?
translation.de: Mir egal, ok? Ich bin kein Karton, ok?

translation.en: I don't need to have four sides for you to look at and approve of, okay?
translation.de: Ich habe keine vier Seiten, die du genehmigen kannst.

translation.en: I have-- I have feelings, River.
These aren't feelings, you're just hysterical.
Well, this is the true me.
This is who I am. I'm a winner.
translation.de: So bin ich. Ich bin ein Gewinner.

translation.en: I'mma win at all costs.
translation.de: Ich gewinne um jeden Preis. Ich kenne meine Zukunft

translation.en: I know what my future's gonna be and I know how to get there.
translation.de: Ich gewinne um jeden Preis. Ich kenne meine Zukunft und den Weg dorthin.

translation.en: And I will not be stopped.
[woman] We have time for one more question each before closing statements.
translation.de: Vor den Schlusserklärungen ist Zeit für je eine Frage.

translation.en: Payton, Mark Twain's classic novel Huckleberry Finn
translation.de: Payton, Mark Twains Klassiker Huckleberry Finn

translation.en: is part of this school's freshman year English curriculum.
translation.de: steht auf dem Lehrplan der Anfänger hier.

translation.en: Do you believe racial epithets should be removed from Huck Finn before it is taught to students?
translation.de: Sollten ethnische Bezeichnungen für den Unterricht gestrichen werden?

translation.en: Well, first of all, thank you, Vicki, for your years of service as part of our yearbook club,
translation.de: Zunächst danke, Vicki, für deine lange Zeit im Jahrbuch-Klub,

translation.en: and thank you for what is a very thoughtful and provocative question.
translation.de: und danke für diese durchdachte und provokative Frage.

translation.en: Now, this question doesn't have an easy answer,
so all I can give you is an honest answer.
No. We should not be rewriting literary giants like Mark Twain.
translation.de: Nein. Wir sollten Literaturgiganten wie Twain nicht umschreiben.

translation.en: Mark Twain loathed racial inequality, and through the eyes of Huckleberry Finn,
translation.de: Er verabscheute ethnische Ungleichheit, und durch Huckleberry Finns Augen

translation.en: he was attempting to shine a light on the...
the heinous, shameful sin of slavery,
and the systemic racism that pervaded every aspect of his life
in the environment in which he was raised.
But make no mistake, the racism that Mark Twain wrote about
translation.de: Aber klar ist auch, der Rassismus, den er beschrieb, ist kein Relikt der Geschichte,

translation.en: has not been banished to the ash heap of history,
translation.de: der Rassismus, den er beschrieb, ist kein Relikt der Geschichte,

translation.en: it's with us in this room today.
Right? It's different, to be sure. It's... more subtle.
But we have a long way to go towards true racial equality in this country,
translation.de: Aber ethnische Gleichberechtigung ist noch weit weg.

translation.en: and as student body president, I'll ensure every student at this school
translation.de: Als Schülerschaftspräsident werde ich allen Schülern

translation.en: has an equal opportunity to succeed,
regardless of their color, creed, national origin,
gender, sexual orientation, genetic information, or disability.
translation.de: Geschlecht, sexueller Orientierung, Genetik oder Behinderung.

translation.en: If you choose to honor me by electing me, I will fight for each and every one of you
translation.de: Wenn ihr mich wählt, werde ich für euch alle kämpfen,

translation.en: so as long as there is strength in me to fight.
translation.de: solange mir die Kraft dazu gegeben ist.

translation.en: So, give me your vote, and help me lead this great school into the future.
translation.de: Gebt mir eure Stimme und helft mir, diese Schule in die Zukunft zu führen.

translation.en: Thank you.
[man] River, last question.
Uh, should the school be able to limit the size of sugary drinks sold at Saint Sebastian?
translation.de: Sollte die Saint Sebastian die Größe gezuckerter Getränke beschränken können?

translation.en: I mean...
Yeah? No?
Who cares?
No, sorry. I appreciate the question, it's a good question.
translation.de: Nein, sorry. Danke für die Frage. Es ist eine gute Frage.

translation.en: I think it's important that we make smart decisions about the food we eat.
I just feel like,
it's hardly the most pressing thing that any of us are dealing with.
translation.de: es ist nicht unser dringendstes Problem.

translation.en: -The world is dark, yeah? -[softly] Oh, my.
And I think teenagers nowadays realize that.
And... I don't know, it kind of feels like the world's ending.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, es scheint so, als ob die Welt bald untergeht.

translation.en: So, you know, if a 42-ounce Mountain Dew makes you happy, I say go for it.
translation.de: Wenn ein großes Mountain Dew euch glücklich macht, nur zu.

translation.en: I keep thinking that, uh, the only thing we all share together
translation.de: Ich denke immer, das Einzige, was wir alle gemeinsam haben,

translation.en: is that we’re all alone.
And we take pictures, and we post them,
and we Facebook and Insta and Tweet and Snap and everything and...
translation.de: nutzen Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Snapchat und so weiter und...

translation.en: it just makes it worse.
[whispers] Ah, man.
I tried to kill myself last year.
translation.de: Ich wollte mich letztes Jahr umbringen.

translation.en: Yeah, I never-- I never told anyone that.
translation.de: Das habe ich nie jemandem erzählt.

translation.en: [chuckles] This is weird, I'm up here, you guys-- Can we-- Can I come down there and talk to you? This is--
translation.de: Schräg. Ich hier oben... Kann ich unten mit euch allen reden?

translation.en: We're friends. We know each other
-[cheering] -We don't have to do this.
-We can have a serious conversation. -Okay, he's walking.
translation.de: Wir können ernsthaft reden... Ok, er läuft los.

translation.en: So, it was, uh, like, about a year ago, and...
translation.de: Es war vor ungefähr einem Jahr und...

translation.en: I don't know, I was just feeling really depressed.
Not even depressed, just... just hopeless, because, um...
translation.de: Gar nicht mal deprimiert, nur hoffnungslos, weil...

translation.en: because I felt so alone. And I, uh... I was afraid I was always gonna feel that way.
translation.de: Weil ich mich so allein fühlte. Ich befürchtete, das würde so bleiben.

translation.en: -He's crying. This is bad, this is bad. -And, so I...
I went home after lax practice one day and I was working out at home...
translation.de: Ich kam vom Lacrosse-Training heim und machte zu Hause Sport.

translation.en: and something made me take a 45-pound plate and, uh...
translation.de: Aus irgendeinem Grund band ich mir eine 20-Kilo-Scheibe...

translation.en: I tied it to my ankle
and I went out to my pool and I jumped in the deep end.
translation.de: und sprang ins tiefe Ende des Pools.

translation.en: And, for a second, I was really...
I was really ready to die.
And then I, like, realized. I was, like, "River, what did you just do?"
translation.de: Dann ging mir auf: "River, was hast du getan?"

translation.en: And I panicked and I tried to get the rope off my ankle and I couldn't.
translation.de: In Panik versuchte ich vergebens, die Schnur zu lösen.

translation.en: And I just remember looking up at the surface of the water and thinking,
translation.de: Ich sah hoch zur Wasseroberfläche und dachte:

translation.en: "No one's here, man.
You're gonna die alone."
And then, um...
next thing I remember I was floating at the surface.
There's no cool ending to the story, it's just the rope untied itself from the weight.
translation.de: Kein cooles Ende, die Schnur hatte sich von selbst gelöst.

translation.en: -I don't know, I never did Boy Scouts. -[all chuckling]
translation.de: Ich war nie bei den Pfadfindern.

translation.en: No one was there.
Oh, God, he's sweating like Nixon.
I don't want anyone here at this school to ever feel like that.
translation.de: Keiner hier an der Schule soll sich jemals so fühlen.

translation.en: It's really important to me that all of you know
translation.de: Es ist mir wichtig, dass ihr wisst:

translation.en: that your lives have value.
And that they're important.
That you're important.
That’s all I got to say.
I love this guy.
[Vicki] Candidates, it's now time for your closing statements.
translation.de: Kandidaten, kommen wir zu euren Schlusserklärungen.

translation.en: I’ll pick it up.
People lie, numbers don't. River's ahead of you ten points post-debate.
translation.de: Menschen lügen, Zahlen nicht. River führt mit zehn Punkten.

translation.en: And if you dig down the tabs at the polls, he is leading you in looks, charisma,
translation.de: Und er führt in punkto Aussehen, Charisma

translation.en: and, most importantly, authenticity.
Basically crushing you in that department. Especially after that masterclass he put on during the debate.
translation.de: Da ist er haushoch überlegen, vor allem nach seiner Sternstunde.

translation.en: Girls love it when a guy who looks like that cries. Not blubbery at all, more of a silent, sexy cry.
translation.de: Mädels lieben weinende Jungs wie ihn. Kein Heulen. Ein stilles, sexy Weinen.

translation.en: Okay, fine, why don't all of you just vote for him, then?
translation.de: Ok, dann stimmt doch alle für ihn.

translation.en: Our loyalty is with you, Payton. This is a plane. We're all headed to the same place.
translation.de: Wir sind dir treu. Es ist ein Flugzeug mit gemeinsamem Ziel.

translation.en: You're the pilot, James and I are your navigators. Neither one of us knows how to fly like you can.
translation.de: -Du bist Pilot, James und ich Lotsen. -Du fliegst am besten.

translation.en: We need you to get us to the White House,
but we wouldn't be doing our job if we weren't being honest with you.
translation.de: Aber wir müssen ehrlich zu dir sein.

translation.en: If we don't tell it like it is, we'll all crash.
Okay, what's my next move?
We need to get you a running mate that softens you up. Someone undeniably real.
translation.de: Ein Partner soll dich weicher machen. Jemand Wahrhaftiges.

translation.en: I recommend a student from the special ed class.
I believe the proper modern vernacular for them is "differently abled."
translation.de: Man spricht heutzutage von Menschen mit Behinderung.

translation.en: So, you're going for the sympathy vote, am I right?
What do you mean?
Well, it's not like we're super good friends.
Been going to school together for three years, the most you and I have ever said to each other is, "Hello."
translation.de: Wir sind seit drei Jahren Mitschüler und sagen höchstens mal "hallo".

translation.en: So, you obviously have some sort of strategy in mind.
The only strategy I'm interested in is being a president for every student at this school.
translation.de: Meine Strategie ist nur, jeden Schüler hier zu vertreten.

translation.en: That includes people like you, who traditionally have not been well represented in student government.
translation.de: Leute wie dich, die in der Schülerschaft schlecht vertreten sind.

translation.en: What exactly does that mean, "people like me"?
translation.de: Was soll das heißen, "Leute wie ich"?

translation.en: C'mon. I mean someone with a disability,
someone who might enjoy sharing the spotlight for once
translation.de: der auch mal ins Rampenlicht möchte

translation.en: and having a hand in shaping the culture at this school.
And "student body vice president" looks pretty good on a college application.
translation.de: Vize-Schulsprecher macht sich gut in der College-Bewerbung.

translation.en: Oh, how thrilling.
What, so you are not even gonna consider it?
[man] Eat a fat one!
John McCain tried that. It was a disaster.
translation.de: John McCain versuchte es. Ein Desaster.

translation.en: Your family once hired Pinkertons to bust up union organizers.
You have three lesser Picassos in your housekeeper's room in your home.
translation.de: In eurem Haushaltsraum hängen drei Picassos.

translation.en: Annie Leibovitz took your family Christmas card photo last year
and you have a 4.3 GPA.
You're untouchable. You need a running mate that can humanize you.
translation.de: Du bist abgehoben. Ein Partner muss dich vermenschlichen.

translation.en: So, what kind of music do you like?
Britney Spears and Insane Clown Posse.
translation.de: Britney Spears und Insane Clown Posse.

translation.en: Yeah, me too.
If you had the chance to stand up in front of the whole school,
translation.de: Wenn du vor der ganzen Schule stehen

translation.en: and you could say anything you wanted, what would you say?
translation.de: und alles sagen könntest, was würdest du sagen?

translation.en: I don't know.
Well, what would you want to get off your chest? Like, if you could change one thing, what would it be?
translation.de: Was würdest du loswerden? Du kannst eine Sache ändern. Was wäre es?

translation.en: Everyone should quit being a faker.
Alice? What do you think?
I love you. Unconditionally.
You are the front man of my favorite rock band,
translation.de: Du bist der Frontmann meiner Lieblingsband,

translation.en: you are the star of my favorite movie, you are my king of kings.
translation.de: der Star meines Lieblingsfilms, mein König der Könige.

translation.en: Nothing is going to stop you from winning this election
translation.de: Nichts wird dich aufhalten, diese Wahl zu gewinnen

translation.en: and turning this school upside down.
But you've got to listen to your advisors.
[woman] I'm just so happy to be alive.
translation.de: Ich bin so froh, am Leben zu sein.

translation.en: I love when I can get outside into the sunshine
translation.de: Ich liebe es, in die Sonne zu gehen

translation.en: and smell the ocean, you know?
-Are you not eating lunch? -[Beethoven's "Für Elise" playing]
No. No, with the chemo I don't always have an appetite.
translation.de: Nein, die Chemo verdirbt mir oft den Appetit.

translation.en: My Nana says I have to eat,
but it's just the medicine I take, it makes everything taste so spicy.
translation.de: aber durch meine Medikamente schmeckt alles so scharf.

translation.en: I'm so sorry to hear that. I...
I cannot imagine what that must be like. High school is hard enough as it is.
translation.de: Ich kann mir das nicht vorstellen. Die Schule ist hart genug.

translation.en: I just don't look at it that way.
I think that every day is a gift.
And every time that I wake up,
even if I have to get a platelet transfusion from Dr. Sengal,
translation.de: selbst wenn ich zur Thrombozytentransfusion muss,

translation.en: I think to myself,
"A lot of kids around the world don't have the same medical care that I do. So...
translation.de: "Viele Jugendliche auf der Welt haben nicht meine medizinische Versorgung.

translation.en: If that's what I have to go through, that's God's plan."
translation.de: Wenn ich das durchmachen muss, ist es eben Gottes Plan."

translation.en: I'm looking for a VP candidate, because I'm running for student body president.
translation.de: Ich suche einen Vizekandidaten. Ich will Präsident werden.

translation.en: Yes, I heard. Andrea told me. She's, um... She said you were good at the debate.
translation.de: Ja, Andrea hat es mir erzählt. Sie... Sie fand dich gut in der Debatte.

translation.en: She takes notes for me when I can't be at school.
translation.de: Sie hilft mir, wenn ich nicht kommen kann.

translation.en: I wish I could've been there, but...
a lot of nice people heard about my chemo and they paid for me to go to Disneyland with my Nana,
translation.de: Viele hörten von der Chemo und gaben Oma und mir Geld für Disneyland.

translation.en: and we got to skip all the lines and it was so much fun.
translation.de: Wir mussten uns nie anstellen. Das war so toll.

translation.en: Best day ever!
What?
What are you--? Why are you looking at me like that?
translation.de: Was? Warum guckst du mich so an?

translation.en: [stammers] I don't know. I just...
I really like you, Infinity.
You're so real.
We'd like a table for two, please.
-Sure, do you have a reservation? -Yes. Jackson.
Dusty and Infinity Jackson.
I'm sorry. I don't see a reservation under any of those names.
translation.de: Tut mir leid. Diese Namen stehen hier nicht.

translation.en: Well, that doesn't make any sense. I mean, I know I definitely called.
translation.de: Das kann nicht sein. Ich habe definitiv angerufen.

translation.en: Sorry. We're fully booked until 9:30.
translation.de: Wir sind bis 21:30 Uhr voll belegt.

translation.en: Would you like to make a reservation for then?
Karen, I want you to meet someone.
translation.de: Karen, ich möchte Ihnen jemanden vorstellen.

translation.en: Infinity, say hello to Karen.
-Hello, Karen. -Hi.
You were really looking forward to eating here, weren't you, babydoll?
translation.de: Du hast dich so gefreut, hier zu essen, oder, Püppchen?

translation.en: Hell, I said, "Let's go to Coco's."
translation.de: Verdammt. Ich sagte: "Gehen wir ins Coco's."

translation.en: I was so excited. I love me some of that Coco's pot pie.
translation.de: Ich war so aufgeregt. Ich liebe die Pastete im Coco's.

translation.en: No, but you dug in. You said, "I want Olive Garden, Nana."
translation.de: Aber du hast Einspruch eingelegt: "Ich will ins Olive Garden, Oma."

translation.en: -[chuckling] -I want Olive Garden, Nana. I do.
translation.de: Ich will ins Olive Garden, Oma.

translation.en: I just got my feeding tube taken out, and my Nana said,
translation.de: Meine Magensonde kam gerade raus, und Oma sagte:

translation.en: "Sure, yeah. You want endless breadsticks, let's go for it."
translation.de: "Klar. Du willst Brotstangen essen? Das machen wir."

translation.en: Why don't you tell Karen about your cancer? Hmm?
You're in pain sometimes, aren't you?
I'm sorry. I couldn't help overhear.
Uh, we're ahead of you, but we'd really like you to have our table.
translation.de: Wir sind vor Ihnen, aber bitte nehmen Sie unseren Tisch.

translation.en: -Oh, no. No, we couldn't poss-- -[woman] Please, I insist.
translation.de: -Oh, nein. Wir können nicht... -Bitte. Ich bestehe darauf.

translation.en: We'd also like to pay for your meal.
Oh, I...
I don't know what to say. Thank you so much.
[woman] It's our pleasure.
You really ought to be ashamed of yourself.
Bye.
It's blinking. I can take your buzzer.
[Karen] Right this way.
Thank you.
Enjoy your evening.
Thank you. You too.
It's so good.
Jesus H. Christ. It's like Rome.
translation.de: Herr im Himmel, genau wie im alten Rom.

translation.en: I mean, all you can eat, and then a quick trip to the vomitorium.
translation.de: Ich meine, Essen bis zum Anschlag und dann ab ins Kotztorium.

translation.en: Dining out used to be something you earned. Well, like you have. But...
translation.de: Früher hat man sich Essengehen verdient. So wie du. Aber...

translation.en: Don't eat that fast!
You're gonna yack it all up like a baby bird. Spit it out.
translation.de: Du wirst alles wieder rauswürgen. Spuck es aus.

translation.en: Oh, Christ. Look at that. Jesus.
translation.de: Oh, Gott. Sieh sich das einer an. Gott.

translation.en: Don't forget, we have free tickets
to the Florida Georgia Line concert on Friday night.
We're gonna be sitting right up in front,
right in the handicap section, right next to the stage.
translation.de: im Behindertenbereich direkt neben der Bühne.

translation.en: -Free tickets. Wow, cool. [chuckles] -Yeah.
So, how was school?
Okay. Payton asked me to be his vice president.
translation.de: Ok. Payton bat mich, seine Vizepräsidentin zu werden.

translation.en: Who's Payton?
He's a boy who's running for school president and he asked me to--
translation.de: Ein Junge, der Schulpräsident werden will und mich bat...

translation.en: Jesus Christ, he's going to get more food.
Yeah.
What? He asked you to be what?
He asked me to be his running mate.
-Yeah? -I don't really know. I mean, he's rich.
-He's really cute. -Well, I hope you said yes.
translation.de: -Er ist echt süß. -Ich hoffe, du hast ja gesagt.

translation.en: I said no.
Why?
[softly] Sad.
I felt like he was using me, and I don't like to be used.
translation.de: Ich hatte das Gefühl, er benutzt mich, und das mag ich nicht.

translation.en: [Dusty sighs] You know what?
You're gonna finish your endless bread basket right now.
translation.de: Du isst jetzt deinen endlosen Brotkorb auf.

translation.en: And tomorrow, you are gonna march up to that boy and you are going to say,
translation.de: Und morgen gehst du zu dem Jungen und sagst:

translation.en: "Thank you very much. I accept your offer."
translation.de: "Vielen Dank. Ich nehme dein Angebot an."

translation.en: Something like this could change your life.
Do you understand me?
You can be vice president.
Aim high.
You can get it all.
-Hi, Infinity. -[gasps] Hi. Jesus!
So, listen, I just was wondering if you had thought any more about my offer.
translation.de: Hast du über mein Angebot nachgedacht?

translation.en: -I've thought about it. -Mm-hmm.
The answer is no.
-Why? -I don't need to tell you.
[woman whispers] Payton!
We have a problem.
[River] That's why I'm proud to announce my running mate,
translation.de: Darum verkünde ich voller Stolz meinen Vizekandidaten,

translation.en: your next student body vice president,
Thank you so much, River.
And, uh, thank you for giving students at Saint Sebastian
translation.de: Danke, dass du den Schülern auf der Saint Sebastian

translation.en: the historic opportunity to elect a gender non-conforming African-American
translation.de: die Chance gibst, einen gendervarianten Afroamerikaner zur Vizepräsidentin

translation.en: to be their vice president.
Now, I can't promise that I'm always gonna agree with you.
translation.de: Ich werde nicht immer deiner Meinung sein.

translation.en: I have a reputation for speaking my mind loudly
translation.de: Ich bin bekannt dafür, laut meine Meinung zu sagen,

translation.en: when I disagree with someone,
but I can promise you strength, fortitude, and the passion
translation.de: aber ich verspreche dir Stärke, Kraft und eine Leidenschaft dafür,

translation.en: to make Saint Sebastian an amazing place.
translation.de: die Saint Sebastian großartig zu machen.

translation.en: -[crowd cheering] -Thank you.
Why are you doing this to me? Why did you have to pick Skye Leighton?
translation.de: Warum tust du mir das an? Warum Skye Leighton?

translation.en: Astrid said if I picked her, I'd have my best shot at winning.
translation.de: Astrid sagte, sie erhöht meine Siegchancen.

translation.en: Why are you listening to her? She doesn’t want what's good for you, she wants power.
translation.de: Aber sie will nicht dein Bestes, sondern nur Macht.

translation.en: You're the way she's gonna get it. She's Lady Macbeth!
translation.de: Über dich. Sie ist Lady Macbeth!

translation.en: -You gotta calm down. -She's jealous of us, can't you see that?
translation.de: Komm runter. Sie ist neidisch auf uns und will es mir wegnehmen!

translation.en: That is why she's trying to take this away from me!
translation.de: Sie ist neidisch auf uns und will es mir wegnehmen!

translation.en: Why are you hurting me?
You-- You have so much pain.
You don't need any of this. You're gonna go to college and join the Peace Corps.
translation.de: Du brauchst es nicht. Du gehst aufs College und ins Friedenskorps.

translation.en: This isn't gonna help you.
I'm sorry.
I really did love you.
-[gun cocks, fires] -[Payton] No!
I wanna bag a Shiras moose.
I wanna bag a Siberian buffalo.
All right. I wanna bag... Margaret Edmund Meyers.
translation.de: Gut. 18 MONATE ZUVOR Ich will Margaret Edmund Meyers umlegen.

translation.en: -Maggie Meyers? -Yes, Maggie Meyers.
-I already did. -Really?
-Full bush. -Dude, nice!
[Payton] Firstly, it's illegal to hunt Siberian bison.
translation.de: Die Jagd auf sibirische Büffel ist illegal.

translation.en: Secondly, when you talk about bagging things,
translation.de: Und das Gerede vom Umlegen klingt bescheuert,

translation.en: you sound like douchebags, especially with your mother present.
translation.de: Und das Gerede vom Umlegen klingt bescheuert, vor allem vor eurer Mutter.

translation.en: You should totally come hunting with us, Payton.
translation.de: Komm mit auf die Jagd, Payton.

translation.en: Yeah, that way we could accidentally shoot you in the back.
translation.de: Wir schießen dir in den Rücken.

translation.en: -[both laughing] -That's enough!
Yo, that's good, Mom.
It's for a series I'm doing to raise awareness and money for the Syrian war debt.
translation.de: Die Serie soll Geld für syrische Kriegsschulden einbringen.

translation.en: This is Orhan. He was killed in an airstrike earlier in the year.
translation.de: Das ist Orhan, der bei einem Luftangriff starb.

translation.en: Bummer.
Are you boys gonna be back for dinner?
No, we have that event in support of eliminating net neutrality.
translation.de: Nein, es gibt ein Event zur Aufhebung der Netzneutralität.

translation.en: How can you be for eliminating net neutrality?
translation.de: Wie könnt ihr nur dafür sein?

translation.en: This family holds 54 million dollars in telecom stocks.
-He doesn’t care, he's barely in the will. -Boys!
translation.de: Ihm egal, er erbt kaum etwas. Jungs!

translation.en: Why are you always defending him?
Because you're bullies. And you're borderline psychopaths.
translation.de: Weil ihr ihn mobbt und Borderline-Psychopathen seid.

translation.en: Of course you're in the will, same as them.
translation.de: Du stehst genauso im Testament wie sie.

translation.en: I saw to that.
Don't tell your father.
You know, I read this study
translation.de: Weißt du, ich las eine Studie

translation.en: from Columbia.
It says that it's impossible for a parent
to love an adopted child as much as a biological one.
translation.de: Adoptivkinder so zu lieben wie eigene.

translation.en: Parents are programmed to be drawn to the children that look most like them.
translation.de: Eltern fühlen sich zu Kindern hingezogen, die ihnen optisch ähneln.

translation.en: I would assume it has something to do with protecting bloodlines.
translation.de: Vermutlich, um die Erblinie zu schützen.

translation.en: Well, I would say that's a flawed study, because I love you the most.
translation.de: Die Studie taugt nichts, denn ich liebe dich am meisten.

translation.en: I always have.
You're just saying that because they grew up to be such jerkwads.
translation.de: Aber nur, weil sie solche Arschgeigen wurden.

translation.en: You're not wrong about that.
You can't teach kindness.
You know? I tried for a long time.
Can't do much with small hearts.
translation.de: Bei kleinen Herzen ist wenig möglich.

translation.en: Hard hearts, maybe, but not small ones.
translation.de: Harte Herzen vielleicht, aber nicht klein.

translation.en: I love them, don't get me wrong, I just...
The love has edges.
It doesn't go on and on the way my love for you does.
translation.de: Sie ist nicht grenzenlos wie meine Liebe zu dir.

translation.en: And you felt that way about me right away?
translation.de: Ging es dir von Anfang an so?

translation.en: Like you were a part of me.
translation.de: Du wurdest ein Teil von mir.

translation.en: It wasn't a meeting, it was a reunion.
translation.de: Es war kein Kennenlernen, es war ein Wiedertreffen.

translation.en: This funny, dark, Jewish hair. These big Disney eyes. And...
translation.de: Dieses lustige, dunkle, jüdische Haar. Diese großen Disney-Augen.

translation.en: You were alone in the world.
And I suppose I felt that way about myself.
translation.de: Und ich fühlte mich auch so.

translation.en: Don't ever listen to your brothers about who they say you are
translation.de: Beachte nicht, was deine Brüder über dich sagen

translation.en: or what you might do in this world.
[singsong] There's my surprise!
[in English] Can I use your restroom?
translation.de: Kann ich mal auf die Toilette?

translation.en: Well, yes, of course. Just follow the path up to the main house.
translation.de: Sicher. Einfach den Weg hoch zum Haus.

translation.en: There's staff.
-You could've at least said hello. -What is he doing here?
translation.de: -Du hättest hallo sagen können. -Was will er hier?

translation.en: He's your new Mandarin tutor.
That's River Barkley, he's incredibly popular at school.
translation.de: Das ist River Barkley, in der Schule sehr beliebt.

translation.en: So are you.
Not his kind of popular. And he's dating my arch-nemesis, Astrid Sloan.
translation.de: Anders. Seine Freundin ist meine Erzfeindin Astrid Sloan.

translation.en: She called me a fag in second grade. I'm not even gay.
translation.de: Sie nannte mich Schwuchtel. Ich bin nicht schwul.

translation.en: Well, he comes very highly recommended.
I suggest you make him like you
translation.de: Bring ihn dazu, dich zu mögen,

translation.en: -and have Astrid Sloan be very jealous. -[sighs]
Fine.
Every single one of these books is an autobiography.
translation.de: Alle diese Bücher hier sind Autobiografien.

translation.en: Lincoln, Ross Perot, US Grant.
I like to read about how others achieved their greatness
translation.de: Ich lese gern, wie andere Großes erreicht haben,

translation.en: so that I can mimic what worked.
You know, fake it till you make it.
What?
I fake it a lot too.
People think I'm... all calm.
translation.de: Alle halten mich für einen gelassenen Typen.

translation.en: I don't know if I really am.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, ob ich es bin.

translation.en: It's sometimes like I'm... feeling the whole world at once, you know?
translation.de: Manchmal fühle ich... die ganze Welt auf einmal.

translation.en: Uh, where did you learn Mandarin?
My dad works for Goldman, so we lived in Shanghai until I was ten.
translation.de: Dad arbeitet bei Goldman. Wir lebten lange in Shanghai.

translation.en: -[in English] "Bathroom"? -[chuckles] Do you want to start?
-Oh, yeah, sure. -Yeah.
[in English] Why are you so tense?
How do you know I'm tense?
I just do.
You don't seem very happy.
Are you happy?
I try to be.
I try to be too.
[voice quavers] I really try.
It's so hard to have to try so hard all the time.
translation.de: Es ist schwer, es die ganze Zeit zu versuchen.

translation.en: Okay, that was weird. Um, how did you get me to be vulnerable like that?
translation.de: Ok, das war schräg. Wie hast du mich so verletzlich gemacht?

translation.en: I'm never like that. [sniffles]
I know.
It's just kinda a thing I do with people.
translation.de: diese Wirkung habe ich auf Leute.

translation.en: Maybe it was just what you needed.
What do you need?
[in English] I don't know what that means.
Can I kiss you?
See you next time?
[Payton] Excuse me. Languages?
-[woman] Third stack. -[Payton] Thank you.
I'm gonna dive right in. I know what's going on between you and River.
translation.de: Ich komme gleich zum Punkt. Ich weiß, was mit dir und River läuft.

translation.en: He told me what happened.
I was mad at first, but then I admired his honesty.
translation.de: Ich war sauer, aber bewunderte seine Ehrlichkeit.

translation.en: River and I have complete transparency.
translation.de: Bei River und mir herrscht Transparenz.

translation.en: I've always known he was fluid. I am too, sorta.
translation.de: Ich wusste immer, dass er fluid ist. Ich bin es auch.

translation.en: And if you're the way he deals with that part of himself, that's fine.
translation.de: Und wenn er diesen Teil seiner selbst mit dir auslebt, ist das ok.

translation.en: But I want in too.
Come over to my house after school.
translation.de: Komm nach der Schule zu mir.

translation.en: Let’s all get it on.
Okay.
I don't know where the gun came from. Um...
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, woher die Pistole kam.

translation.en: He just turned away for a moment
and then he had it in his hand and then he shot himself.
translation.de: hatte sie in der Hand und erschoss sich.

translation.en: [officer] Son, look at me.
I never heard a sound like that before.
translation.de: So was habe ich noch nie gehört.

translation.en: I need you to focus and tell me everything you remember.
translation.de: Konzentrieren Sie sich. Woran erinnern Sie sich?

translation.en: What happened?
He killed himself.
He did this because of you.
-[officer] Miss? -I have to see him.
-Sorry, you can’t-- -I have to see him! I’m his girlfriend.
translation.de: -Nein... -Ich bin seine Freundin. Ich muss ihn sehen.

translation.en: I'm his girlfriend!
I should be crying.
Why aren't I crying?
It's not you.
They told me when you were born you didn't even cry.
translation.de: Selbst bei deiner Geburt weintest du nicht.

translation.en: You just came out and looked at everyone with a furrowed brow.
translation.de: Du kamst raus und sahst alle stirnrunzelnd an.

translation.en: I’m worried... that I...
translation.de: Ich mache mir Sorgen, dass ich...

translation.en: that I don't have the same feelings everyone else does.
I think a lot of young people feel that way, especially nowadays.
translation.de: Vielen jungen Leuten geht das so, vor allem heutzutage.

translation.en: Your generation got the terrible idea
translation.de: Deine Generation hatte die miese Idee,

translation.en: that it was best to vomit every thought and feeling all over each other.
translation.de: jeden Gedanken und jedes Gefühl übereinander zu erbrechen.

translation.en: It's a pandemic of overcommunication that's led to an absence of intimacy.
translation.de: Dieses Übermaß an Kommunikation erzeugt einen Mangel an Intimität.

translation.en: It's more than that for me.
What if I'm just wired differently?
I mean, what if I can't feel for anyone else?
translation.de: Was ist, wenn ich nichts für andere empfinden kann?

translation.en: They say that sociopaths can't do that.
What if all I'll ever able to do is pretend to feel?
translation.de: Was ist, wenn ich Gefühle immer nur vortäuschen kann?

translation.en: Does it matter if you can’t tell the difference?
translation.de: Ist das wichtig, wenn man es nicht merkt?

translation.en: I'm sorry about River.
translation.de: Das mit River tut mir leid.

translation.en: He was a wonderful boy.
[woman] This is gonna sound awful, but I'm just gonna say it.
translation.de: Es klingt fies, aber ich sage es einfach.

translation.en: Now that River's dead, you're running unopposed.
translation.de: Du hast jetzt keine Gegner mehr.

translation.en: -Seriously? -I can't believe you just said that.
Sorry, but it's my job.
-[Payton sighs] -You know you don't have to do this.
I want to.
[woman] And while they ask that you respect their privacy at this time,
translation.de: Sie bat zwar um Rücksicht auf ihre Privatsphäre,

translation.en: River's family wishes to express their gratitude
for the outpouring of support they have received in the last few days.
translation.de: für die überwältigende Anteilnahme der letzten Tage.

translation.en: It's trying times like these
where we, as a community, look to our student leaders
for a way to move forward and begin to heal.
translation.de: den Blick nach vorne und Heilung ermöglichen.

translation.en: Payton?
I didn't really get to know River until last year.
translation.de: Ich lernte River erst letztes Jahr kennen.

translation.en: He was my tutor.
Then he became my friend.
And then, my opponent.
We found ourselves running against one another, but River never made it feel like a competition.
translation.de: Doch River trat nicht als Konkurrent auf.

translation.en: He would always say, "Don’t worry about it, Payton. Let the best man win."
translation.de: Er sagte immer: "Keine Sorge, Payton. Möge der Beste gewinnen."

translation.en: Now, the best man can't win.
translation.de: Jetzt kann der Beste nicht gewinnen.

translation.en: Uh, River was very active in the drama department,
so I've asked one of his many friends to help me sing a song in his honor.
translation.de: Jemand seiner vielen Freunde hilft mir, ihm zu Ehren etwas zu singen.

translation.en: ♪ It's coming on Christmas They're cutting down trees ♪
♪ Putting up reindeer Singing songs of joy and peace ♪
translation.de: Rentiere überall Man singt von Freude und Frieden

translation.en: ♪ Oh, I wish I had a river ♪
translation.de: Oh, ich wünsche mir einen Fluss

translation.en: ♪ I could skate away on ♪
♪ But it don't snow here ♪
♪ It stays pretty green ♪
♪ Gonna make a lot of money Then I’m gonna quit this crazy scene ♪
translation.de: Ich werde Geld scheffeln Und diese verrückte Gegend verlassen

translation.en: ♪ Oh, I wish I had a river ♪
translation.de: Oh, ich wünsche mir einen Fluss

translation.en: ♪ I could skate away on ♪
♪ Oh, I wish I had a river so long ♪
translation.de: Oh, ich wünsche mir einen Fluss so lang

translation.en: ♪ I would teach my feet to fly ♪
translation.de: Ich würde meinen Füßen Das Fliegen beibringen

translation.en: ♪ Oh, I wish I had a river ♪
translation.de: Oh, ich wünsche mir einen Fluss

translation.en: ♪ I could skate away on ♪
♪ I made my baby cry ♪
translation.de: Ich brachte mein Baby zum Weinen

translation.en: ♪ He tried hard to help me You know, he put me at ease ♪
translation.de: Er versuchte, mir zu helfen Er hat mich beruhigt

translation.en: ♪ And he loved me so naughty Made me weak in the knees ♪
translation.de: Und er liebte mich so ungezogen Ich bekam weiche Knie

translation.en: ♪ Oh, I wish I had a river ♪
translation.de: Oh, ich wünsche mir einen Fluss

translation.en: ♪ I could skate away on ♪
♪ Oh, I wish I had a river so long ♪
translation.de: Oh, ich wünsche mir einen Fluss so lang

translation.en: ♪ I would teach my feet to fly ♪
translation.de: Ich würde meinen Füßen Das Fliegen beibringen

translation.en: ♪ Oh, I wish I had a river ♪
translation.de: Oh, ich wünsche mir einen Fluss

translation.en: ♪ I could skate away on ♪
♪ I made my baby say goodbye ♪
translation.de: Ich brachte mein Baby dazu Lebewohl zu sagen

translation.en: ♪ It's coming on Christmas They're cutting down trees ♪
♪ They're putting up reindeer And singing songs of joy and peace ♪
translation.de: Rentiere überall Man singt von Freude und Frieden

translation.en: ♪ Oh, I wish I had a river ♪
translation.de: Oh, ich wünsche mir einen Fluss

translation.en: ♪ I could skate away on ♪
[Payton] River's girlfriend, Astrid, has asked to say a few words.
translation.de: Rivers Freundin Astrid möchte einige Worte sagen.

translation.en: Thank you, Payton, that was beautiful. I’m sure River would've appreciated it.
translation.de: Danke, Payton, das war wunderschön. River hätte es gefallen.

translation.en: You were right when you said the best man can't win.
translation.de: Du hast recht, der Beste kann nicht gewinnen.

translation.en: There was only one person in this race up for the job.
translation.de: Nur einer im Rennen war der Aufgabe gewachsen.

translation.en: And now he's gone.
That is why I've decided to run in River's place.
translation.de: Darum werde ich an Rivers Stelle kandidieren.

translation.en: -My running mate will be Skye Leighton. -[applause]
We will try to be the first all-female ticket in this school's history.
translation.de: Wir wollen das erste rein weibliche Team der Schule sein.

translation.en: If you believed in what River stood for,
translation.de: Wenn ihr daran glaubt, wofür River stand,

translation.en: good, because so did I.
translation.de: gut, denn ich tat es auch.

translation.en: And if you give me your vote,
then together, we can keep River's memory alive.
translation.de: halten wir gemeinsam Rivers Andenken lebendig.

translation.en: Thank you.
You wanted to see me?
This came for you.
Open it.
Waitlisted.
[sighs] Sweetheart.
A lifetime of focus and planning, carefully studying applications obtained on the black market
translation.de: Lebenslanger Fokus und Planung, Studium von Bewerbungen vom Schwarzmarkt,

translation.en: to pinpoint the exact combination of extracurriculars and test scores
translation.de: um mit dem Mix aus außerschulischen Aktivitäten und Noten

translation.en: that would optimize my chances at acceptance.
Three years on that stupid literary magazine. Model UN.
translation.de: Drei Jahre blödes Literaturmagazin. Schüler-UN. Freiwilligencamp in Costa Rica.

translation.en: And service-oriented summer camp in Costa Rica.
Flippin' Mandarin!
-They haven't said no. -This is worse. This is worse than no.
translation.de: Es ist kein Nein. Es ist schlimmer als Nein.

translation.en: This is-- This is, "Let's wait and see if we find anybody better."
translation.de: Es ist: "Vielleicht gibt es jemand Besseren.

translation.en: This is, "Even if we take you, you're our second choice."
translation.de: Du bist immer nur zweite Wahl."

translation.en: Why didn't-- Why didn't they want me?
They took those morons.
Well, your father and I bought their way in.
translation.de: Mit Geld von deinem Vater und mir.

translation.en: You were very clear. You said you wanted to do this properly.
translation.de: Und du sagtest ganz klar, du willst es richtig machen.

translation.en: No, I can't get in that way. People know it. It stays with you.
translation.de: Nein, so darf ich nicht rein. So was bleibt haften.

translation.en: It's-- It's handing your opponent a negative ad on a platter.
translation.de: Das ist kostenlose Munition für den Gegner.

translation.en: Come here.
Don't litter.
Okay.
Waitlisted is not "no" and you're going to get in.
translation.de: Warteliste ist kein Nein. Du kommst rein.

translation.en: You're the most exceptional human being I've ever met.
Hold on. You must've gotten your letter today too.
translation.de: Warte. Du hast deinen Brief heute auch bekommen.

translation.en: I'm sure that they have an algorithm that demands they take so many women
translation.de: Es gibt sicher einen Algorithmus, damit soundso viele Frauen

translation.en: and so many applicants from this group or that.
Yes, I got in.
Alice, please, don't diminish your accomplishments to soothe my ego.
translation.de: Mach dich nicht klein, um mein Ego zu streicheln.

translation.en: You're gonna be valedictorian.
You have a gold medal in fencing from the Junior Olympics. You speak six languages.
translation.de: Du gewannst Gold im Fechten. Du sprichst sechs Sprachen.

translation.en: No one deserves to go to Harvard more than you.
translation.de: Keiner verdient Harvard mehr als du.

translation.en: -And I am so happy for you. -[giggles]
translation.de: Und ich freue mich sehr für dich.

translation.en: Tonight is about getting you back on your feet 100%,
translation.de: Heute stellen wir dich wieder auf die Beine,

translation.en: so you can win this election and make this world a better place.
translation.de: damit du gewinnst und die Welt verbesserst.

translation.en: Thomas, please go set up your table in the massage room. You'll give Payton a treatment as soon as we're done.
translation.de: Thomas, bereiten Sie den Massageraum vor. Sie werden Payton gleich behandeln.

translation.en: Reiki, cups, and acupuncture.
-You're too good to be true. -[chuckles]
I have a plan to help you win. But first, I need to ask you some questions,
translation.de: Ich habe einen Plan für deinen Sieg. Aber ich muss dir Fragen stellen.

translation.en: and I need you to answer me honestly, no judgment. I swear.
translation.de: -Antworte ehrlich. Ich urteile nicht. -Ich schwöre es.

translation.en: Did you kill River?
I won't judge you or turn you in. I just want to know.
translation.de: Ich werde dich nicht verurteilen oder anzeigen. Ich will es nur wissen.

translation.en: While you didn't anticipate Astrid jumping into the campaign,
you might have correctly thought that River dying would be your clearest path to victory.
translation.de: und du dachtest vielleicht, nach Rivers Tod gewinnst du.

translation.en: I didn't kill him.
We need to break up.
-You said you wouldn't judge me! -Not really break up.
We need to pretend to break up in order for you to win the election.
translation.de: Vorgetäuscht, damit du die Wahl gewinnst.

translation.en: Right now, you and Astrid are splitting the sympathy vote.
translation.de: Du teilst dir mit Astrid die Mitleidsstimmen.

translation.en: I'm going to confess that I cheated on you.
translation.de: Ich beichte, dass ich dich betrogen habe.

translation.en: It'll be a scandal.
You will dump me and everyone will feel sorry for you.
translation.de: Du servierst mich ab. Alle bemitleiden dich.

translation.en: I've cleared with McAfee and James. They think it could gain you six to nine points,
translation.de: McAfee und James denken, es bringt sechs bis neun Punkte,

translation.en: depending on how magnanimous you are about the whole thing.
translation.de: je nachdem, wie groß du es aufziehst.

translation.en: But everyone will hate you.
I love you.
This... is what love looks like, Payton.
This is what sacrifice looks like.
This is what it takes to change the world.
translation.de: Das ist nötig, um die Welt zu verändern.

translation.en: I am your first lady today...
translation.de: Ich bin heute deine First Lady

translation.en: and always.
-But there are rules. -Rules?
We will break up
long enough for you to win and for no one to suspect duplicity on our parts.
translation.de: solange, bis du gewinnst und keiner mehr faules Spiel wittert.

translation.en: You will post photos of Big Sur,
translation.de: Du wirst Fotos von Big Sur posten,

translation.en: the truffle french fries at Hoagies Diner on Route 14,
translation.de: von den Trüffel-Pommes im Hoagies Diner

translation.en: and cute dogs on your Instagram at least once a day with captions like,
translation.de: und von süßen Hunden. Mindestens einmal täglich auf Instagram:

translation.en: "Wish I was here," and "Yummy," and "heart emoji."
When you do so, I will know you were thinking of me.
translation.de: Dann weiß ich, dass du an mich dachtest.

translation.en: A secret code. I love it.
And, most importantly,
when you pass me in the hall, you will not pay me any mind.
translation.de: wenn du mir im Flur begegnest, beachtest du mich nicht.

translation.en: But as soon as we're past each other, you will turn and look back.
translation.de: Aber sobald wir aneinander vorbei sind, wirfst du einen Blick zurück.

translation.en: I need you to do this for me or I won't be able to survive.
translation.de: Tu das für mich, sonst überlebe ich es nicht.

translation.en: Do you agree to these terms?
You are the best thing that will ever happen to me.
translation.de: Du bist das Beste, was mir je passieren wird.

translation.en: Yes.
I agree.
Let's move on to fish course.
I don't want to say "I'm overwhelmed with shame."
-That's too calculating, it sounds fake. -It is fake.
No.
[typing] "I broke up with Payton tonight.
I guess you could say I cheated on him, though it's more complicated than that.
translation.de: Ich habe ihn wohl betrogen, obwohl es komplizierter ist.

translation.en: I will not name the other party involved at this time out of respect to their family. Period."
translation.de: Aus Respekt vor seiner Familie sage ich nicht, mit wem. Punkt.

translation.en: That's good. Mysterious. Really makes you lean in.
Post it.
-[social media alerts] -This is good.
Jesus, people are freakin' animals. These comments are brutal.
translation.de: Das sind Tiere. Die Kommentare sind brutal.

translation.en: -[James] This is really good. -[social media alerts continue]
I didn't like doing that.
I know.
It's the right thing to do.
Hey, Payton. We're ready when you are, buddy.
translation.de: Hey, Payton. Wir sind bereit, wenn du es bist.

translation.en: Okay.
-♪ I felt the strangest emotion ♪ -[silent mouthing]
[man] Payton.
Hey, kiddo.
Look, I know you've been struggling with Mandarin and River was tutoring you.
translation.de: Ich weiß, Sie kämpfen mit Mandarin, und River gab Ihnen Nachhilfe.

translation.en: [sighs] You must be going through a lot right now.
Yeah, I am.
Just show up for the exams, and I'll give you an A.
translation.de: Kommen Sie zur Prüfung. Ich gebe Ihnen eine Eins.

translation.en: Okay?
Thank you.
Okay.
Hey, man, I'm really sorry.
[whispers] Numbers look great. Genius. Wish I'd thought of it.
translation.de: Tolle Zahlen. Geniale Idee. Leider nicht meine.

translation.en: Go to the cafeteria and press some flesh.
translation.de: Lass dich in der Mensa blicken.

translation.en: Well, I can imagine.
Well, well, well. Oh.
Look who's home. [chuckles]
Ms. Fancypants, shut the door.
translation.de: Wertes Fräulein, mach die Tür zu.

translation.en: Yes, ma'am.
-Sit down. -Yes, ma'am.
[sighs] This lovely young man was telling me
translation.de: Dieser reizende junge Mann sagte mir,

translation.en: that you turned him down again as a running mate in the school election.
translation.de: dass du wieder abgelehnt hast, seine Vizekandidatin zu werden.

translation.en: That is twice now that you have defied me and I would like an explanation.
translation.de: Damit hast du mir zweimal getrotzt. Ich verlange eine Erklärung.

translation.en: I just don't want all that attention.
Oh, don't you lie to me.
You were the one who begged me to call the Channel 13 news team
translation.de: Du warst es, die mich anflehte, das News-Team von Channel 13 anzurufen,

translation.en: so you could get a free trip to Legoland.
translation.de: damit du kostenlos ins Legoland konntest.

translation.en: And the second those cameras turned on,
well, you just about peed your pants, you were so excited.
translation.de: bist du vor Aufregung fast geplatzt.

translation.en: You know, actually, Ms. Jackson, uh, Infinity, I have--
translation.de: Ms. Jackson, Infinity, ich sah alle Berichte über dich.

translation.en: I've seen all the local news stories on you and they are...
translation.de: Infinity, ich sah alle Berichte über dich. Sie sind...

translation.en: Oh, God, they're so inspiring.
But I really think that this could be something even bigger.
translation.de: Aber ich denke, das hier könnte noch größer werden.

translation.en: I think this could be a national news story.
Infinity, you could become the voice of a generation of handicapable children.
translation.de: Du kannst die Stimme einer Generation von andersfähigen Kindern sein.

translation.en: You know, at the risk of sounding vulgar, it's worth remembering
translation.de: Auch wenn es vulgär klingt, du könntest Kapital daraus schlagen,

translation.en: that you could parlay something like that into serious, regular income
translation.de: du könntest Kapital daraus schlagen, ein gutes, regelmäßiges Einkommen allein durch Instagram.

translation.en: just off of Instagram alone.
translation.de: ein gutes, regelmäßiges Einkommen allein durch Instagram.

translation.en: Wait a minute.
-We could make some money on this? -Absolutely. Oh, absolutely.
translation.de: -Wir könnten damit Geld verdienen? -Auf jeden Fall.

translation.en: Well, hot damn!
[Payton] If it would be at all helpful,
I'd be happy to provide you with a cash loan that could be used for anything.
translation.de: leihe ich Ihnen gern Bargeld für beliebige Zwecke.

translation.en: Paying off medical bills, buying a new car.
Wait a minute. A new car?
-[stammers] Anything. -[laughs] I like the sound of that.
translation.de: Alles! Das hört sich gut an.

translation.en: You know, I must say, I like the sound of your voice.
translation.de: Ich mag den Klang Ihrer Stimme.

translation.en: Really? Yeah?
Yeah, I really-- It's got a real melodic tone to it. Is that-- Are you from the South?
translation.de: Ja. Sie ist sehr melodiös. Sind Sie aus dem Süden?

translation.en: Well, I am a country girl.
translation.de: Ich bin ein Mädchen vom Land.

translation.en: I knew it. I knew it.
-West-goddamn-Virginia. [chuckles] -Of course.
Yeah, I drove all the way to California from Martinsville.
translation.de: Ja, ich fuhr den ganzen Weg von Martinsville nach Kalifornien.

translation.en: You ever heard of Martinsville?
-I don't think I have. -[chuckles]
-Stop it. Stop it. Just stop it! -What?!
[whispers] I know what he's doing.
I know what you're doing.
Payton, you're trying to seduce us.
You're using your money and your interest
translation.de: Du benutzt dein Geld und dein Interesse

translation.en: and you're throwing it around like it's nothing.
translation.de: und wirfst damit nur so um dich.

translation.en: Hey, you are being a rude little toad.
translation.de: Hey, du bist eine unhöfliche kleine Kröte.

translation.en: He's a fake, Nana. He's a fake. I don't trust anything that he says.
translation.de: Er täuscht alles nur vor, Oma. Ich glaube ihm kein Wort.

translation.en: I'm so sorry.
-I really do apologize, dear. -No, no, no.
translation.de: Ich entschuldige mich, mein Lieber. Tut mir leid.

translation.en: -I am so sorry. -Uh, no, no, she's right.
translation.de: Ich entschuldige mich, mein Lieber. Tut mir leid. Nein, sie hat recht.

translation.en: She's right.
River died and... my girlfriend broke up with me
translation.de: River ist gestorben, meine Freundin hat Schluss gemacht,

translation.en: and I don't think that I've processed any of it.
translation.de: und ich habe das noch nicht verarbeitet.

translation.en: Um, I just keep acting like everything is normal.
translation.de: Ich tue so, als wäre alles normal.

translation.en: I just keep going through the motions,
like nothing happened, but it did, I know that it did.
translation.de: als wäre nichts passiert, aber es ist passiert.

translation.en: I know it did, and I still, I can't...
translation.de: Ich weiß, es ist passiert, aber ich kann nicht...

translation.en: I can't feel anything.
You're right, Infinity. You're right.
I'm a fake.
You shouldn't believe anything I say,
because I don't know that I believe it either.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht mal, ob ich mir glaube.

translation.en: I think that's why I want you for a running mate.
translation.de: Darum will ich dich als Vize.

translation.en: You're authentic and you're real,
and I can't even face the truth because...
translation.de: Du bist authentisch und wahrhaftig. Ich kann mich der Wahrheit nicht stellen...

translation.en: because the truth is... [sobs]
...the truth is that I loved him.
translation.de: Die Wahrheit ist, ich habe ihn geliebt.

translation.en: Oh, my God. I loved him so much. [gasping]
translation.de: Oh mein Gott. Ich habe ihn so geliebt.

translation.en: And now he's gone.
I'm so sorry, Payton.
translation.de: Es tut mir so leid, Payton.

translation.en: I believe you now.
[whispers] Hey, I believe you.
Okay?
We got her.
Because that's what life's all about. It's not about avoiding adversity,
translation.de: Darum geht es im Leben. Nicht darum, Unglück zu vermeiden,

translation.en: it's how we handle the hard times when they come barging into our lives,
translation.de: sondern darum, wie wir mit schlechten Zeiten umgehen,

translation.en: destroying everything we hold dear.
translation.de: die alles zerstören, was wir lieben.

translation.en: And that's why I've got someone very special with me today.
translation.de: Und darum ist jemand Besonderes bei mir.

translation.en: Now, this is a girl that we've all met, but...
translation.de: Wir alle haben das Mädchen gesehen,

translation.en: she's someone that I don't think a lot of us really know.
translation.de: aber ich denke, keiner kennt sie richtig.

translation.en: And I think that the reason that I find her so inspiring
is because... I look at my life,
translation.de: weil mein Leben und alles, was in den letzten Wochen geschah,

translation.en: and what's happened in the past few weeks, even the past few hours,
translation.de: weil mein Leben und alles, was in den letzten Wochen geschah, sogar in den letzten Stunden, kein Vergleich ist zu dem,

translation.en: does not even compare
translation.de: sogar in den letzten Stunden, kein Vergleich ist zu dem,

translation.en: to the struggles that this young woman has to face every moment of every day.
translation.de: womit diese junge Frau Tag für Tag zu kämpfen hat.

translation.en: And yet, she looks at the future... with hope and optimism
translation.de: Dennoch blickt sie mit Hoffnung und Optimismus in die Zukunft

translation.en: and a sense of humor.
Infinity, you inspire me.
That is why I'm proud to introduce you as my running mate today.
translation.de: Ich bin stolz, dich als meinen Vize vorzustellen.

translation.en: Ladies and gentleman, the next vice president of Saint Sebastian,
translation.de: Die nächste Vizepräsidentin der Saint Sebastian,

translation.en: Infinity Jackson!
Thank you.
Oh, my God, that was so nice.
translation.de: Mein Gott, das war so nett.

translation.en: How about this one, huh? Let's hear it.
translation.de: Da ist sie. Hören wir ihr zu.

translation.en: Thank you, my gosh, thank you. Uh...
I guess Payton's right.
My life hasn't always been easy, but my Nana-- my Nana always says,
translation.de: Mein Leben ist nicht immer einfach, aber meine Oma sagt immer:

translation.en: Congrats on the musical, by the way. Nice to see you.
translation.de: Gratuliere zum Musical. Schön, dich zu sehen.

translation.en: Hey, looking good, guys. Thanks for being here.
translation.de: Gut siehst du aus. Danke fürs Kommen.

translation.en: "...a lot worse than you." And she's right.
-She already has an 80% approval rating. -And a fan account on Instagram.
[Infinity] I'm one of the lucky ones.
Sit back and enjoy the show.
-But I'm counting my blessings today. -[exhales]
translation.de: Ich bin dankbar für das, was ich habe.

translation.en: We're all lucky, aren't we?
Right, Eric, sorry.
You douchebag, my name is Andrew.
I'm here, I'm alive, I'm with all of you beautiful people.
translation.de: Ich bin hier, ich lebe. Ich bin bei euch schönen Menschen.

translation.en: I was coming to find you. I’m really sorry. I want you to know this was a really--
translation.de: Ich habe dich gesucht. Tut mir echt leid. Es...

translation.en: She's scamming everyone, you know that, right?
translation.de: Sie macht allen etwas vor. Das weißt du, oder?

translation.en: -What? Who? -Infinity.
It's all a big scam. She's not sick.
translation.de: Es ist ein Riesenbetrug. Sie ist nicht krank.

translation.en: Thank you, Payton.
Thank you, Saint Sebastian.
She's faking it.
[Infinity] I...
[laughs] I’m gonna work my butt off for you guys.
translation.de: Ich werde mir für euch den Hintern aufreißen.

translation.en: I mean, like, let's just get out there and win this thing!
translation.de: Lasst uns da rausgehen und das Ding gewinnen!

translation.en: -Yeah! -[cheers and applause]
